messages.content: Susan Williams works with Jesse Foster.
Jesse Foster is a colleague of Jerry Kelly.
Jerry Kelly works with Catherine Jordan.
Catherine Jordan is a colleague of Samuel Jimenez.
Samuel Jimenez works with Gary Romero.
Gary Romero is a colleague of Gerald Hall.
Gerald Hall works with Kelly Mitchell.
Kelly Mitchell is a colleague of Eugene White.
Eugene White works with Anna Barnes.
Anna Barnes is a colleague of Janet Aguilar.

queries.question: Are Susan Williams and Janet Aguilar related to each other at work through colleagues relations?

reference_answer.text: Yes, they are indirect colleagues according to their graph relations.
